Package ca.ualberta.cs.team07recipefinder

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataDownloadListener
    Abstract type to be used as a trigger for async tasks to return data back to activity.
    View<M>
    Generic View interface for the view classes to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BogoPicGen
    Copyright 2012 Bryan Liles and Abram Hindle .
    BogoPicGenActivity  
    Camera
    A class that contains the folder name where images are saved, the number of images in the file, and a method for setting the file for the bitmap image.
    CameraActivity
    Activity that allows the user to take a picture and save it to the sd storage.
    DeleteRecipeTask
    Async task that deletes recipe from elasticsearch.
    ElasticSearchResponse<T>
    Elastic Search response type used for getting data back from the internet.
    ElasticSearchSearchResponse<T>
    Elastic Search response type used for getting data back from the internet.
    Hits<T>
    Gets and returns a collection of hits from elastic search server.
    HttpClient
    Methods for saving recipes, deleting recipes, and searching for recipes from webservice: http://cmput301.softwareprocess.es:8080/CMPUT301W13T07/ Majority of code from: https://github.com/rayzhangcl/ESDemo
    Image
    Data class to hold filename and bitmap together for saving purposes.
    ImageController
    Controller for images.
    ImageGalleryActivity
    This is the gallery view activity for viewing images of a recipe.
    MainActivity
    Main activity that is launched when user has an account.
    NewRecipeActivity
    The NewRecipeActvity displays EditTexts for the user to enter a recipe title, description, and directions.
    Pantry
    This is the Pantry class has only one variable, ingredients, which is a array list of strings.
    Recipe
    Data class that contains the components of a Recipe.
    RecipeController
    Writes and deletes recipes to the local database (cache) and can update/write/delete .
    RecipeView
    Contains methods used by NewRecipeActivity and ViewRecipeActivity for altering and displaying Recipe information.
    SearchByPantryActivity
    This activity is launched when the user selects "Search Using My Pantry" from the Search tab.
    SearchRecipeTask
    Async task to get search results from elastic search server.
    SqlClient
    A helper class for the Sqlite database that stores the user's locally cached recipes.
    User
    Contains user credentials and any information that requires persistence.
    UserActivity
    Activity which displays account creation the first time app is used.
    ViewRecipeActivity
    The ViewRecipeActivity displays the information about a particular Recipe.
    WriteRecipeTask
    Async task to write recipe to elasticsearch.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Recipe.Location
